给一下源码

replies.author: roj234
replies.txt_content:
(translationKey, Object[] param)
translationkey是语言文件的key
可以在其中使用 %s 按顺序获取param中的object的toString

eg:
  test.key=%s as %s

new TextComponentTranslation("test.key", new Object[] {"abc", "def"})

显示: abc as def

因为没办法用%0 %1之类的所以原版一些指令才会看起来那么奇怪
